projects.name: AI4Interview
projects.shortDescription: AI-driven framework for personality identification and interview quality assessment for better hiring assessment.
projects.fullDescription:
Our AI4Interview project focuses on enhancing recruitment processes by leveraging AI technologies to evaluate candidates' personalities and quantify interview quality.

Key Objectives:
- Personality Identification: Developing AI models to analyze interview responses and infer personality traits based on behavioral cues.
- Interview Quality Assessment: Creating metrics to objectively evaluate the quality and effectiveness of interviews.
- Improving Recruitment Efficiency: Streamlining the hiring process with data-driven insights for better candidate selection.

projects.name: LLMs as Assessors
projects.shortDescription: AI tools for automatic grading, learning assistance, and personalized education systems.
projects.fullDescription:
Our LLMs as Assessor or Evaluators (LaE) project harnesses the power of large language models to revolutionize education through automation and personalization.

Key Focus Areas:
- Automatic Grading: Utilizing LLMs to evaluate student answers with consistency and accuracy.
- Learning Assistance: Providing students with tailored feedback and resources for self-improvement.
- Personalized Education: Building systems that adapt to individual learning styles and needs.
